Description.Name: Null Signature System
Description.Details: The Null Signature System cloaks a BattleMech's heat output and electronic emissions, rendering it virtually undetectable to all but visual sensors. Employing a combination of heat baffles and electronic countermeasures, the system effectively erases the 'Mech's presence from the battlefield. This advanced technology, developed by the Terran Hegemony alongside the Chameleon LPS, proved invaluable for covert operations and surprise attacks.
